component_one.title: Make Your AI SaaS Product in a weekend
component_one.description: The complete Next.js boilerplate for building profitable SaaS, packed with AI, auth, payments, i18n, newsletter, dashboard, blog, docs, blocks, themes, SEO and more.

control_panel.title: Image Upload
control_panel.description: Upload an image to use as a reference, maximum {maxImages} images allowed
control_panel.prompt_description: Describe what you want to change in the image
control_panel.prompt_placeholder: Example: Change the background to a blue sky
control_panel.aspect_ratio_description: Choose the aspect ratio you want to use
control_panel.output_count_description: Choose the number of outputs you want
